timeline.message:
Introduce MongoDBUpsertRetryer

This allows us to wrap upsert calls, which will
be retried once upon an DuplicateKeyException.

Fixes #7258

timeline.bodyText: How about adding LOG statements to the catch blocks? Might help debugging this in the future.
